cardtext: A former digital producer with an extensive editorial background. Now a certified full-stack web developer experienced in building applications from scratch to deployment.
Freelances to help businesses construct their websites, passionate about React.js, and effective at combining creativity and problem solving to develop user-friendly applications.
Known among staff as a positive self-starter with excellent abilities multitasking and attention to detail, Christina is eager to begin a new career and hit the ground running.
